sentence.idiomatic: Do you pledge that you will love her all your life?
Maybe she will never have the opportunity to study for the rest of her life.
He hasn't told a lie in his whole life.
Who did you rank below in the last exam?
People who rank in the top twenty have a chance to get the scholarship.
He is in fifth place in the running competition.
You have been to Beijing? Then how come you don't even know the Great Wall?
Even with your assignments you have get other people to do it for you?
She left without even turning off the computer.
The contest is coming up soon. You must hurry up and practice.
If you don't keep on top of the work you definitely won't finish it.
There are three days until the exam. She is staying on top of her reviewing.
How has domestic competition been in these past few years?
These two companies began competing for talented employees.
The competition in the household electrical appliance market is getting fiercer and fiercer.
She wasn't very studious when she was young.
Do you work hard at studying Chinese?
He is studying hard.
In order to buy his friend a gift he wasted a lot of money.
Watching TV really wastes time.
Because you didn't say the address clearly it caused me to waste a lot of effort.
Children can't talk back to parents.
I wasn't talking back. I was only stating my own point of view.
How dare you talk back to the boss?
How come you are still watching TV? Have you finished all your homework?
I finished it a long time ago. I’m watching TV for a while to relax a bit.
While you’re watching TV, everyone else is studying hard and doing extra lessons. The competition these days is so fierce; if you don’t stay on top of it, you won’t make it!

How am I not staying on top of it? Every day, besides doing a huge pile of assignments and extra-curricular lessons, I also have to practice piano and take art class. I really can’t take it! Why can’t you allow me to have a little time to relax? What other childhood pleasures do I have?
If you don’t work hard now, you won’t get into university, and your whole life will be ruined. When that time comes it will be too late for regrets.
I’m not only hard-working--my grades are already quite good. I’m always ranked in the top ten. How can you still not be satisfied?

What use is there in comparing with those worse than you? You need to realize there are still quite a few people ahead of you. Now look, you have again wasted all this time, hurry up and get studying!
I hate that!
What? How dare you talk back!
